actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services..

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide travel and transportation allowances for emergency leave and ordinary leave for compassionate reasons granted to servicemen stationed overseas.

summary.text: Provides travel and transportation allowances for emergency leave and ordinary leave for compassionate reasons granted to servicemen stationed overseas. (Adds 37 U.S.C. sec. 404(a)(5))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide travel and transportation allowances for emergency leave and ordinary leave for compassionate reasons granted to servicemen stationed overseas.
